items.msg: This is in Collapsible Group 1 and this attribute makes sure that all collapsible elements under the specified parent will be closed when one of the collapsible item is shown.
This is in Collapsible Group 2 and this attribute makes sure that all collapsible elements under the specified parent will be closed when one of the collapsible item is shown.
This is in Collapsible Group 3 and this attribute makes sure that all collapsible elements under the specified parent will be closed when one of the collapsible item is shown.
